uvi.product_version: versions from v3.14 to before v5.13
uvi.description:
i2c: robotfuzz-osif: fix control-request directions

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.13 by commit 4ca070ef0dd885616ef294d269a9bf8e3b258e1a, it was introduced in version v3.14 by commit 83e53a8f120f2f273cf0ad717f5372ab79ac24fe. For more details please see the references link.
